questions.question: Dimitri’s counselor told him that post secondary education can be expensive but can pay off in the long run.  Why?

choices.answer: Salary earned w/ a degr. will pay back the cost of college over your career
You can get grants/scholarships to pay for post sec ed while you are there
There are less expensive options for obtaining a post secondary education
All of the above

questions.question: What are the benefits of attending a local community college?

choices.answer: Cheaper to earn an Associate’s deg. at a community college & then transfer
You can live at home & save dorm fees while earning an Associate’s degree
Choosing a local comm. college within closer driving range saves on transp.
All of the above

questions.question: Textbooks, transportation and room and board are all...

choices.answer: Included in the price of attending a college or university
Additional costs for attending a college or university
Included in a school's tuition
Usually offered to students who stay on campus

questions.question: Which of these additional costs will most likely be the most expensive?

choices.answer: Textbooks and supplies
Academic counseling
Room and board
Transportation

questions.question: Preparing to pay for higher education can start in 9th grade or earlier by...

choices.answer: Applying for scholarships
Opening a 529 plan
Taking out student loans
Applying for grants

questions.question: A 529 plan can help you save more money than a traditional savings account because...

choices.answer: It is a tax free
It is given to you at a very young age
The interest rates are considerably better
It is linked to the stock market

questions.question: Which of the following is true about the Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA)?

choices.answer: The earliest you can submit your FAFSA is October 1st of each year
The form is available online or on paper
States may have different deadlines for applying for state aid
All of the above

questions.question: The fact that you are more likely to earn more money over your lifetime with a post secondary degree means...

choices.answer: Don't be concerned about the amount of debt you go into to pay for it
The more money you pay for the degree guarantees a higher salary
The cost of a post secondary degree is worth it
The cost of a post secondary degree should be avoided

questions.question: Which of the following answers lists 4 year colleges from generally the least expensive to most expensive?

choices.answer: In-state public university, private university, out-of-state public univ.
In-state public university, out-of-state public university, private univ.
Private university, in-state public university, out-of-state public univ.
Out-of-state public university, private university, in-state public univ.

questions.question: What can affect whether a public or private university is affordable?

choices.answer: The amount of financial aid that they offer
Whether you live in the state of the private university
Whether you are from "out of state" forthe private university
The interest rates that the universities charge for their loans

questions.question: What has the biggest impact on whether a 4 year university is affordable?

choices.answer: Whether it is a public or private university
The amount of financial aid that the university offers
Whether you live in the same state as the university
The distance you live from the university

questions.question: Living at home while enrolled in post secondary school or training can save money on....

choices.answer: Books but it raises costs for tuition
Transportation but it raise costs for books and supplies
Books but it raises costs for transportation
Room and board but it raises costs for transportation

questions.question: What type of federal funding is free money, but is based on financial need only?

choices.answer: Federal grants
All federal scholarships
The 529 Plan
None of these are correct

questions.question: Federally-funded grants require the student to...

choices.answer: Earn above average grades
Have a membership in a high school club
Perform volunteer work for a local community agency
Have financial need only

questions.question: Everyone interested in post sec. education should complete the Free Application for Federal Student Aid - FAFSA. Why?

choices.answer: It gives you access to private student loans
Allows you to be eligible for federal student aid & other grants/scholarsh.
It is a requirement for college admission
None of the above
